sentences.sContent: Might it not be better to relegate the king to a purely ceremonial function?
sentences.sCn: 使该国王降级到一种纯粹礼仪性的职能难道不更好吗？

remMethod.val: re + leg(选择) + ate → 重新选择职位 → 使降级

trans.tranCn: 使降级， 贬谪； 交付， 托付
trans.tranOther: if a sports team is relegated, it is moved into a lower  division
